title: CEO/Chair of Board
description: A chief executive officer, the highest-ranking person in a company or other institution, ultimately responsible for making managerial decisions.

title: COO/VP Operations
description: The chief operating officer (COO) is responsible for executing and implementing the operational directives set by the CEO and the board of directors.

title: CFO/VP Administration
description: A chief financial officer is a senior executive with responsibility for the financial affairs of a corporation. The VP Administration directs administrative functions in line with policies and regulations.

title: VP Client Services
description: Responsible for the Consumer Banking division performing roles including lending, investing, risk management, marketing, and technology; provides solutions to help retail customers meet financial goals.

title: CIO
description: Chief Information Officer is the senior executive responsible for information technology and computer systems that support bank goals.

title: VP Sales & Marketing
description: Responsible for overall strategic marketing plans for the organization to attract and retain customers.

title: Director Financial and Audit Svcs
description: Ensures the company conducts business in compliance with laws, regulations and professional standards; maintains financial and audit controls.

title: Director Human Resources
description: Responsible for organizational development, recruitment, employment law, performance management, employee relations, and compensation and benefits.

title: Director Legal Services/General Counsel
description: Senior executive managing legal affairs for the company.

title: Director Information Technology
description: Manages IT infrastructure, operations and services enabling business access to data and services.

title: Director Information Security and CISO
description: The chief information security officer (CISO) is responsible for establishing and maintaining the security strategy and program to protect information assets and technologies.

title: Director Accounting
description: Responsible for analysis and reconciliation of accounts and development of accounting policies, procedures and controls.

title: Director Physical Security
description: Responsible for identifying, assessing, and integrating physical security operations, technology, and policy solutions.

title: Director Facilities
description: Oversees facilities management and related operations.

title: Manager, Business Continuity and Disaster Recovery
description: Develops and implements business continuity and disaster recovery strategies, including risk assessments and procedures.

title: Manager, Internal Audit
description: Performs audits including risk and control management and assesses financial reliability to ensure compliance.

title: Chief Architect
description: Designs overall architecture and technical strategy.

title: Manager, Security Architecture
description: Designs and oversees implementation of security measures ensuring systems are resistant to threats while compliant with policies.

title: Solution Architect, Online Banking
description: Designs solution architecture for online banking services.

title: Manager, Application Solutions
description: Leads application solutions teams and efforts.

title: Lead Developer, Online Banking
description: Leads development efforts for online banking.

title: Manager, Operational Risk
description: Monitors and manages operational and economic risk exposures, placing appropriate controls.

title: Manager, Vendor Relations
description: Manages vendor relationships and performance.

title: Manager, Purchasing
description: Leads procurement and purchasing processes.

title: Manager, Communications
description: Handles internal and external communications strategies.

title: Manager Customer Experience and Community Eng.
description: Fosters customer loyalty through quality interactions and community engagement.

title: Manager of Sales
description: Leads and coaches the sales team, sets quotas and analyzes performance.

title: Manager, Marketing
description: Develops and executes strategic marketing plans.

title: Business Analyst, Online Banking
description: Analyzes business needs for online banking functionality.

title: Manager, Contract Management
description: Oversees contract lifecycle and compliance.

title: Manager, Compliance Management
description: Manages compliance activities and regulatory requirements.

title: Manager IT End User Service Desk
description: Manages daily operations of the service desk and the team supporting end users.
